Title: Bucovina
Description: Famous for its **UNESCO-listed Painted Monasteries**, such as **Voroneț** (known for its vivid blue frescoes), **Bucovina** invites you to explore its spiritual and artistic heritage. The rolling hills and quaint villages offer a serene escape, while local dishes like **sarmale** and **smoked cheese** tantalize your taste buds.

Title: Maramureș
Description: Step back in time in **Maramureș**, where life flows to the rhythm of traditions preserved for centuries. Admire the **UNESCO-listed wooden churches** with intricate carvings, or take a ride on the **Mocănița Steam Train** through breathtaking landscapes. Experience authentic Romanian culture with locals who still wear traditional clothing and celebrate festivals with vibrant folk music and dance.
